title: Calories in 90/10 Ground Beef
meta_description: Discover calories in 90 10 ground beef per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for cooked portions.
assumptions: 90% lean / 10% fat ground beef, cooked (broiled patty), drained; no added seasonings or oils.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fat content, cooking method, draining, and brand; raw values differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cooked 90/10 ground beef provides ~214 kcal and ~26g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 90 10 ground beef per 100g?
faqs.a: About 214 kcal for cooked 90/10 ground beef per 100g.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 90/10 ground beef?
Does cooking change calories in 90 10 ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, cooked has higher density (~214 kcal/100g) vs. raw (~176 kcal/100g) due to water loss.

faqs.q: How much fat in 90/10 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 11.7g total fat per 100g cooked, including 4.7g saturated.

faqs.q: Calories in a 4oz serving of 90 10 ground beef?
faqs.a: A 113g cooked patty has ~242 kcal; adjust for exact weight.
